party-count: See how many pokemon are in the party
ball-count: See how many pokeballs you have
summary: Show a gif of the last few frames
bannedMessage: You have been banned from using this bot. <@!%ID%>
bannedMessageTooNew: Your account is too new, adding to banned list. <@!%ID%>
ban: Ban a user from using the bot (only bot admins can use this command)
unban: Unban a user (only bot admins can use this command)
banOptionUserId: The user id of the user to ban
unbanOptionUserId: The user id of the user to unban
userNotBanned: User %NAME% tried to unban user with ID: <@!%OPTION%> but they are not banned.
userAlreadyBanned: User %NAME% tried to ban user with ID: <@!%OPTION%> but they are already banned.
userUnbanned: User %NAME% has unbanned user with ID: <@!%OPTION%>
